Name: Turn Me On
About the game: Race through neon tracks in VR but, plot twist, you'll need to hit lamps to turn the track on. Turn Me On is an arcade style racing game for Vive, make it to the end of the track and try to beat your high score.
Meta Title: Turn Me On: Aug 18, 2019, Hotel Octopus and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on Turn Me On? Check out the release date (Aug 18, 2019), developer insights from Hotel Octopus, and a complete game summary.
